sentence: In The Nation, reviewer Katha Pollitt said, Gibson has violated just about every precept of the (United States Conference of Catholic Bishops) conference's own 1988 ' Criteria ' for the portrayal of Jews in dramatizations of the Passion (no bloodthirsty Jews, no rabble, no use of Scripture that reinforces negative stereotypes of Jews, etc.
